EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. TEN METER S/V CIELO, CREAM HULL, ONE PERSON
   ON BOARD, DISABLED IN 29-12.76S 011-40.89E.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO CAPE
   TOWN RADIO, PHONE: 272 1551 0700
   E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 993/16(28), 821/16 REFERS.
3. CANCEL HYDROLANT 987/16.
